Key Match Events: Ismaila Sarr scored the winning penalty for Senegal after 71 minutes
Burundi prevented Senegal from scoring until the 71st minute
Post-Match Reflections: Burundi coach Nda Yiragije Etienne expressed resilience and maintained fighting spirit
Senegal coach Aliou Cisse stated they managed to get three points despite a poor performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Burundi won their first away match against Malawi
Senegal leads Group L with four points, followed by Burundi with three points
